item.title: How to embed http websites in your R presentation ?
item.description: Brice Beffara - March 18, 2018 Sometimes it can be usefull to incorporate web content in a presentation. I needed it in one of my R presentations few months ago and did not know about any straightfoward solution to do so. Aggregating - fragmented but usefull - discussions found on forums, I came to a kind of solution using <iframe>. Usually “The HTML <iframe> element represents a nested browsing context, effectively embedding another HTML page into the current page” - developer.
